steps.name: Action Test Step 1 : Set Vendor simulator to fail (MTNNG ERROR ERROR_VENDOR_SYSTEM)
Action Test Step 2 : Wait 5 seconds for simulator to run
Action Test Step 3 : Execute Fin Terms Calculate REST Request
Action Test Step 4 : Execute Reserve and Transact V4 REST Request
Action Test Step 5 : Set Vendor simulator to fail (MTNNG ERROR ERROR_INV_MSISDN)
Action Test Step 6 : Wait 5 seconds for simulator to run and transaction data to process
Step.1 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not empty)
Step.2 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field exists (not null)
Step.3 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate clientId field is correct
Step.4 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate productId field is correct
Step.5 --> Financial Terms Calculate response assertions --> Validate purchaseAmount field is correct
Step.6 --> Reserve and Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate responseCode field is correct
Step.7 --> Reserve and Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate responseMessage field is correct
Step.8 --> Reserve and Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate raasTxnRef field exists
Step.9 --> Reserve and Transact V4 REST response assertions --> Validate HTTPResponseCode field exists
Action Test Step 7 : Wait 10 seconds before executing RAAS DB Transaction_Log Assertions
Step.10 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate raas_txn_ref field is correct
Step.11 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate account_identifier field is correct
Step.12 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate amount field is correct
Step.13 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate channel_id field is correct
Step.14 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate channel_session_id field is correct
Step.15 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate client_id field is correct
Step.16 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate client_txn_ref field is correct
Step.17 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate created field exists
Step.18 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate event_type field exists
Step.19 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate product_id field is correct
Step.20 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate source_identifier field is correct
Step.21 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate target_identifier field is correct
Step.22 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate timestamp field exists
Step.23 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate cdc_update_timestamp field exists
Step.24 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate channel_name field is correct
Step.25 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate reserve_amount field is correct
Step.26 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate target_identifier field is correct
Step.27 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate fee_amount field exists
Step.28 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate client_share_amount field exists
Step.29 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate settlement_amount field exists
Step.30 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate vend_amount field is correct
Step.31 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate vendor_share_amount field exists
Step.32 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate raas_request_created field exists
Step.33 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate raas_response_created field exists
Step.34 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate transaction_result_request_created field exists
Step.35 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate transaction_result_response_created field exists
Step.36 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate raas_response_response_code field is correct
Step.37 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate raas_response_message field is correct
Step.38 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate transaction_result_request_response_code field is correct
Step.39 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate transaction_result_response_response_code field is correct
Step.40 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate currency_code field is correct
Step.41 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate funding_source_id field is correct
Step.42 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.transaction_log --> Validate additional_data_financial_calculations field exists
Step.43 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.raas_request --> Validate raas_txn_ref field is correct
Step.44 --> RAAS DB assertions --> Table: raas.raas_request --> Validate account_identifier field is correct

Action Test Step 8 : Wait 15 seconds before executing CTX DB Assertions
